sourcesContent:
<template>
    <n-form>
        <n-form-item-row label="用户名">
            <n-input v-model:value="registerUsername" placeholder="" />
        </n-form-item-row>
        
        <n-form-item-row label="密码">
            <n-input v-model:value="registerPassword" placeholder=""/>
        </n-form-item-row>
          
        <n-form-item-row label="重复密码">
            //<n-input passively-activated @input="checkRePassword" v-model:value="rePassword" placeholder=""/>
            <n-input
                v-model:value="rePassword"
                :disabled="!model.password"
                type="password"
                @keydown.enter.prevent
            />
        </n-form-item-row>
          
        <n-form-item-row label="邀请码">
            <n-input v-model:value="invitation_code" placeholder=""/>
        </n-form-item-row>
        
    </n-form>
    <n-button @click="register" type="primary" block secondary strong>
          注册
    </n-button>

</template>


<script setup>
import {NFormItemRow,NForm,NButton,NInput} from 'naive-ui';
import {ref,defineExpose} from 'vue';
import {useRoute} from 'vue-router';
import axios from 'axios';

//注册表单操作
const registerUsername=ref('');
const registerPassword=ref('');
//const registerRePassword=ref('');
const invitationCode = ref('');
const router=useRoute();
const registeredNextPath = ref('');

const register=async()=>{
    try{
      const response = axios.post('/account/register/',
      {
        username:registerUsername,
        password:registerPassword,
        invitation_code:invitationCode,
        },
      {
            headers:{
                //'X-CSRFToken': csrfToken.value,
                }
      });
      console.log(response);
      console.log('注册成功！');
      await router.push(registeredNextPath.value);
    }
    catch(err){
        console.log('注册失败:',err)}
    
 }

defineExpose({register});
</script>
<style>
.n-input{
    text-align:left}
</style>
